GameDBLocalizedString.Text: We have guided missiles, plasma rifles, RP drones, sonic rams and a load of vehicles of different tonnage, but most of the time we will just send the Troopers. You know, cost-effectiveness.

The invention of Force-shield technology led to a melee combat renaissance. Even now, when ranged weapons started to catch up, military droids rely on trusty old power-blades. These beauties have served for almost 30 years now.

Ask any UNSS kid about their dream job. It's always a garbage man, a paleontologist, or a Titan pilot. Then, as an adult, nobody wants to work exposed to the weather or kneel in dirt all day. Soon, the paleontologists will join the extinct species, while the Titans still kick ass!
Can attack up to 3 enemies standing next to each other.
